stimulusHtml: If y = f(x) is a solution to the differential equation  d y d x = e x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E71@ with the initial condition f(0) = 2, which of the following is true?
choicesHtml: f( x )=1+ e x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F83@

f( x )=2x e x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F9F@

f( x )= ∫ 1 x e t 2 dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@440C@

f( x )=2+ ∫ 0 x e t 2 dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45A9@

f( x )=2+ ∫ 2 x e t 2 dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45AB@
